mapper.sql:
temp_orders_tracking.tracking_id as temp_orders_tracking_tracking_id, temp_orders_tracking.dispatching_id as temp_orders_tracking_dispatching_id, temp_orders_tracking.message as temp_orders_tracking_message, temp_orders_tracking.status as temp_orders_tracking_status, temp_orders_tracking.creater as temp_orders_tracking_creater, temp_orders_tracking.create_time as temp_orders_tracking_create_time, temp_orders_tracking.updater as temp_orders_tracking_updater, temp_orders_tracking.update_time as temp_orders_tracking_update_time
,temp_storehouse_dispatching.dispatching_code as temp_orders_tracking_dispatching_display ,temp_creater.user_cn_name as temp_orders_tracking_creater_display ,temp_updater.user_cn_name as temp_orders_tracking_updater_display

LEFT JOIN t_orders_dispatching temp_orders_dispatching ON temp_orders_dispatching.dispatching_id = temp_orders_tracking.dispatching_id LEFT JOIN t_user temp_creater ON temp_creater.user_id = temp_orders_tracking.creater LEFT JOIN t_user temp_updater ON temp_updater.user_id = temp_orders_tracking.updater
